entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
